subject: Football
Tests and Testing
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. Players Association plans to appeal a judge’s ruling in the case of five players facing suspensions over positive drug tests. The union filed its notice of appeal with the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit.
snippet: The N.F.L. Players Association plans to appeal a judge’s ruling in the case of five players facing suspensions over positive drug tests. The union filed its notice of appeal with the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit.
